an8.73:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
an8.73:1.6: “maraṇassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā.
an8.73:2.1: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.73:2.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:2.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ rattindivaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:2.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:3.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:3.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ divasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:3.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:4.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:4.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ upaḍḍhadivasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:4.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:5.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:5.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:5.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:6.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:6.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ upaḍḍhapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:6.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:7.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:7.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:7.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:8.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:8.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:8.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:9.3: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhāvesi maraṇassatin”ti?
an8.73:9.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi, passasitvā vā assasāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:9.6: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, bhāvemi maraṇassatin”ti.
an8.73:10.1: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
an8.73:10.3: ‘aho vatāhaṁ rattindivaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:10.4: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an8.73:10.5: ‘aho vatāhaṁ divasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti;
an8.73:10.6: yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an8.73:10.7: ‘aho vatāhaṁ upaḍḍhadivasaṁ jīveyyaṁ, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:10.8: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an8.73:10.9: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti;
an8.73:10.10: yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an8.73:10.11: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ upaḍḍhapiṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:10.12: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an8.73:10.13: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti—
an8.73:10.14: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhū pamattā viharanti, dandhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya’.
an8.73:11.1: Yo ca khvāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an8.73:11.2: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ ekaṁ ālopaṁ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti.
an8.73:11.3: Yo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāveti:
an8.73:11.4: ‘aho vatāhaṁ tadantaraṁ jīveyyaṁ yadantaraṁ assasitvā vā passasāmi, passasitvā vā assasāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṁ manasi kareyyaṁ, bahu vata me kataṁ assā’ti—
an8.73:11.5: ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhū appamattā viharanti, tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāventi āsavānaṁ khayāya’.
an8.73:12.2: ‘appamattā viharissāma, tikkhaṁ maraṇassatiṁ bhāvayissāma āsavānaṁ khayāyā’ti.
